name: Robo Escape (Agentt9990)
description:
Made in 1 week for the 105$ game jam. You play as Robo, a robot who tries to escape from his evil creators facility after developing a self conscious from how good his ai has become. Play through intriguing puzzles while you escape the facility in this graphical adventure game.

If you manage to get a box stuck in a corner or something, you can press P while you are near it to reset its position.

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/futuristic-music-game-music
